explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine-learning algorithms to explore rich information by incorporating macroeconomic conditions into investment strategies.
explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions using Neural Networks (NN) to build an Economic Factor-based Predictive Model (EFPM).
explanations.deep learning: The use of Neural Networks (NN) for predictive modeling implies the application of deep learning techniques, as neural networks are a fundamental component of deep learning.
